General.Name: Kuo Yang Construction Co Ltd
General.Description: Kuo Yang Construction Co.,Ltd engages in the construction of public housing projects in Taiwan. It also leases and sells commercial residential buildings, industrial plants, and commercial buildings. In addition, the company is involved in the real estate investment, development, and rental and leasing; department store; hotel and restaurant management; and horticulture and afforestation services. Kuo Yang Construction Co.,Ltd was founded in 1961 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.555, Zhongxiao East Road 4, Taipei, Taiwan
